siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Forward emails from your own domain to your personal email. Support wild card routing, catch-all forwarding, fan out to multiple addresses. Support webhook so you can process incoming emails and build application based on email workflow.
blogPost.body: Forward emails from your own domain to your personal email. Support wild card routing, catch-all forwarding, fan out to multiple addresses. Support webhook so you can process incoming emails and build application based on email workflow.
blogPost.title: Hanami - Easy email forwarding for your domain
blogPost.author: Vinh

localize.description: 将自己域名的邮件转发到个人邮箱。支持通配符路由、全局转发、扇形转发到多个地址。支持webhook，使您可以处理收到的邮件，并根据邮件工作流程建立应用程序。
localize.tagline: 为您的域名轻松转发电子邮件

localize.description: 將自己域名的郵件轉發到個人郵箱。支持通配符路由、全局轉發、扇形轉發到多個地址。支持webhook，使您可以處理收到的郵件，並根據郵件工作流程建立應用程序。
localize.tagline: 爲您的域名輕鬆轉發電子郵件

previous.excerpt: All Hands is a collection of 25 high res photos, featuring hands of all shades, shapes, and sizes, holding iOS devices. Download the layered PSD mockups, add your screens, and diversify how you present your work.
previous.title: The All Hands Collection - Diversify your product mockups

localize.description: 所有的手是25张高分辨率照片的集合，以各种色调，形状和大小的手为特色，手持iOS设备。下载分层的PSD模拟图，添加你的屏幕，让你的作品呈现方式多样化。
localize.tagline: 使你的产品模拟图多样化

localize.description: 所有的手是25張高分辨率照片的集合，以各種色調，形狀和大小的手爲特色，手持iOS設備。下載分層的PSD模擬圖，添加你的屏幕，讓你的作品呈現方式多樣化。
localize.tagline: 使你的產品模擬圖多樣化

next.excerpt: Voices you'll love on productivity, strategy, and more—all for one bundle price. New writers join every month. Access to an evergreen archive of 200+ essays, read by 750k+ curious business people.
next.title: Every - A writer collective covering productivity, strategy, & more

localize.description: 你会喜欢的关于生产力、战略等方面的声音--所有这些都只需一个捆绑价格。每月都有新作者加入。访问由75万+好奇的商务人士阅读的200多篇文章组成的常青档案。
localize.tagline: 一个涵盖生产力、战略等内容的作家集体。

localize.description: 你會喜歡的關於生產力、戰略等方面的聲音--所有這些都只需一個捆綁價格。每月都有新作者加入。訪問由75萬+好奇的商務人士閱讀的200多篇文章組成的常青檔案。
localize.tagline: 一個涵蓋生產力、戰略等內容的作家集體。
